title: Buongiorno Italia! Programs 11-20
brief_description: A double video set containing ten 25 minute episodes numbered 11 to 20 of the Italian language instructional program, “Buongiorno Italia!”. Contents: 11. Revision. 12. Asking for service. 13. Talking about how things are done. 14. Talking about what you’ve been doing. 15. Saying where you’ve been. 16. Revision. 17. Home, family and work. 18. Talking about how things used to be. 19. Tuscany and its people. 20. And so to finish. To be used in conjunction with “Buongiorno Italia!: programs 1-10” and “Buongiorno Italia! [kit]”.
